TopicTitle: SAS and throttle are turned off after staging

Articles.Content: I experienced this bug while perfoming air launch challenge. My rocket was decoupled from plane but rocket SAS was turned off and throttle was set on 0%, which was dangerous for air launch. After second staging situation repeated and it caused missclicking, because I didn;t reaslize that input went and engine was turned on

I experienced something similar when working on my air launch challenge. I noticed when staging decouplers on my probe that a 'connection lost' notification would appear for a moment, coinciding with the throttle and SAS being reset. I suspect the momentary connection loss is what's causing trouble. That would also explain why I never experienced this sort of thing with a manned craft.
